{"id":"chatcmpl-524","object":"chat.completion","created":1766351458,"model":"qwen3:latest","system_fingerprint":"fp_ollama","choices":[{"index":0,"message":{"role":"assistant","content":"","reasoning":"Okay, the user is asking where in the book the professor Zvezdochkin is first mentioned, excluding headers. Let me think about how to approach this.

First, I need to create a cursor to search for mentions of "профессор Звёздочкин". The function mcp-create_cursor is the right tool here. I'll set the name as "search_cursor" and the description to look for the professor's name. Since the user wants the first mention, I should start from the beginning of the document.

Next, I'll use mcp-run_agent with the cursor name and a task description to find the first occurrence. The agent will iterate through the document. Once it finds the first mention, the response should include the pointerLabel and the actual text. I need to make sure that the answer doesn't include any headers, so I'll check the paragraph content. If the cursor returns a result, I'll stop and provide that. If not, I'll continue searching until the end of the document. If no mention is found, I'll inform the user accordingly.
","tool_calls":[{"id":"call_b60utkeg","index":0,"type":"function","function":{"name":"mcp-create_cursor","arguments":"{"description":"Мentions of профессор Звёздочкин (исключая заголовки)","name":"search_cursor"}"}}]},"finish_reason":"tool_calls"}],"usage":{"prompt_tokens":748,"completion_tokens":272,"total_tokens":1020}}
